en_us: Come on in, the air's fine
Adds the ability to store potions in Liquid Tanks! You can also use a potion by walking beneath a potion-filled Liquid Tank.
Potions can be stored in liquid tanks; extended potions count as a three potions.\n\nPotions can be taken out by putting a bottle in the tank, but tanks will not output extended potions.
Mobs under a potion tank will gain the potion effect from that tank.\n\nShulkers on an empty or levitation potion tank will fill it with Levitation potion liquid.
Witches on an empty tank will fill it with Regeneration, Fire Resistance, Speed, or Instant Damage potion liquid.\n\nThey will also fill pre-existing potion tanks with those four potions.
